author: jfarrell
msg: THRIFT-1335: Add accept timeout to TServerSocket
Added an accept timeout to the TServerSocket poll loop

author: jleroux
msg: * Remove useless boiler plate code which makes things harder to read
* if on one line w/out {}, it avoid future errors: you can't miss the block if you need to add a line
* else on one line w/out {}, it avoid future errors: you can't miss the block if you need to add a line
* no else when return in previous if
The result is a much easier code to read. I'd recommend to use this style everywhere in OFBiz. Of course this suppose a screen with larger width than in 2000 years...
